verses.verse: And he <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban's<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> has <S%H3947>taken<s%> away <S%H3605>all<s%> that was our <S%H1>father's;<s%> and of that <S%H834>which<s%> was our <S%H1>father's<s%> has he <S%H6213>gotten<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> this <S%H3519>glory.<s%>
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7200>beheld<s%> the <S%H6440>countenance<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was not toward him as <S%H8543>before.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H7725>Return<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and to your <S%H4138>kindred;<s%> and I will be with you.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> to the <S%H7704>field<s%> to his <S%H6629>flock,<s%>

And <S%H559>said<s%> to them, I <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6440>countenance,<s%> that it is not toward me as <S%H8543>before;<s%> <S%H8032><s%> but the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> has <S%H1961>been<s%> with me.
And you <S%H3045>know<s%> that with <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3581>power<s%> I have <S%H5647>served<s%> your <S%H1>father.<s%>

And your <S%H1>father<s%> has <S%H2048>deceived<s%> me, and <S%H2498>changed<s%> my <S%H4909>wages<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4489>times;<s%> but <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>suffered<s%> him not to <S%H7489>hurt<s%> me.

<S%H518>If<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3541>thus,<s%> The <S%H5348>speckled<s%> shall be your <S%H7939>wages;<s%> then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H5348>speckled:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3541>thus,<s%> The <S%H6124>ringstraked<s%> shall be your <S%H7939>hire;<s%> then <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> <S%H6124>ringstraked.<s%>
Thus <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5337>taken<s%> away the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H5414>given<s%> them to me.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass at the <S%H6256>time<s%> that the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> <S%H3179>conceived,<s%> that I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H6260>rams<s%> which <S%H5927>leaped<s%> on the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> were <S%H6124>ringstraked,<s%> <S%H5348>speckled,<s%> and <S%H1261>spotted.<s%>
And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to me in a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> saying, <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%> And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Here<s%> am I.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5375>Lift<s%> up <S%H4994>now<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6260>rams<s%> which <S%H5927>leap<s%> on the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> are <S%H6124>ringstraked,<s%> <S%H5348>speckled,<s%> and <S%H1261>spotted:<s%> for I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> to you.

I am the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you <S%H4886>anointed<s%> the <S%H4676>pillar,<s%> and <S%H834>where<s%> you <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to me: <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H3318>get<s%> you out from <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H4138>kindred.<s%>

And <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Is there <S%H5750>yet<s%> any <S%H2506>portion<s%> or <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for us in our <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house?<s%>
Are we not <S%H2803>counted<s%> of him <S%H5237>strangers?<s%> for he has <S%H4376>sold<s%> us, and has quite <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> our <S%H3701>money.<s%>

For <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6239>riches<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5337>taken<s%> from our <S%H1>father,<s%> that is ours, and our <S%H1121>children's:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> then, <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> to you, <S%H6213>do.<s%>
Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up, and <S%H5375>set<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H802>wives<s%> on <S%H1581>camels;<s%>

And he <S%H5090>carried<s%> away <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H7399>goods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H7408>gotten,<s%> the <S%H4735>cattle<s%> of his <S%H7075>getting,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H7408>gotten<s%> in <S%H6307>Padanaram,<s%> for to <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1494>shear<s%> his <S%H6629>sheep:<s%> and <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had <S%H1589>stolen<s%> the <S%H8655>images<s%> that were her <S%H1>father's.<s%>
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1589>stole<s%> away <S%H3820>unawares<s%> <S%H3824><s%> to <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian,<s%> in that he <S%H5046>told<s%> him not that he <S%H1272>fled.<s%>

So he <S%H1272>fled<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> that he had; and he <S%H6965>rose<s%> up, and <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5104>river,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>
And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H1272>fled.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> with him, and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him <S%H7651>seven<s%> days' <S%H3117><s%><S%H1870>journey;<s%> and they <S%H1692>overtook<s%> him in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> that you <S%H1696>speak<s%> not to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> either <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5704>or<s%> <S%H7451>bad.<s%>

Then <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5381>overtook<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> Now <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> had <S%H8628>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount:<s%> and <S%H3837>Laban<s%> with his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H8628>pitched<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have you <S%H6213>done,<s%> that you have <S%H1589>stolen<s%> away <S%H3820>unawares<s%> <S%H3824><s%> to me, and <S%H5090>carried<s%> away my <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> as <S%H7617>captives<s%> taken with the <S%H2719>sword?<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> did you <S%H1272>flee<s%> away <S%H2244>secretly,<s%> and <S%H1589>steal<s%> away from me; and did not <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, that I might have <S%H7971>sent<s%> you away with <S%H8057>mirth,<s%> and with <S%H7892>songs,<s%> with <S%H8596>tabret,<s%> and with <S%H3658>harp?<s%>
And have not <S%H5203>suffered<s%> me to <S%H5401>kiss<s%> my <S%H1121>sons<s%> and my <S%H1323>daughters?<s%> you have <S%H6258>now<s%> done <S%H5528>foolishly<s%> in so <S%H6213>doing.<s%>

It is in the <S%H410>power<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> you <S%H7451>hurt:<s%> but the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to me last <S%H570>night,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> you <S%H8104>heed<s%> that you <S%H1696>speak<s%> not to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> either <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5704>or<s%> <S%H7451>bad.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> though you would needs be <S%H1980>gone,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you sore <S%H3700>longed<s%> after your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> yet <S%H4100>why<s%> have you <S%H1589>stolen<s%> my <S%H430>gods?<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> I was <S%H3372>afraid:<s%> for I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6435>Peradventure<s%> you would <S%H1497>take<s%> by <S%H1497>force<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> from me.

With <S%H834>whomsoever<s%> you <S%H4672>find<s%> your <S%H430>gods,<s%> let him not <S%H2421>live:<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> our <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H5234>discern<s%> you <S%H4100>what<s%> is your with me, and <S%H3947>take<s%> it to you. For <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had <S%H1589>stolen<s%> them.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H168>tent,<s%> and into <S%H3812>Leah's<s%> <S%H168>tent,<s%> and into the <S%H8147>two<s%> maidservants' <S%H519><s%><S%H168>tents;<s%> but he <S%H4672>found<s%> them not. Then <S%H3318>went<s%> he out of <S%H3812>Leah's<s%> <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H935>entered<s%> into <S%H7354>Rachel's<s%> <S%H168>tent.<s%>

Now <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H8655>images,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> them in the <S%H1581>camel's<s%> <S%H3733>furniture,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> on them. And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H4959>searched<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H168>tent,<s%> but <S%H4672>found<s%> them not.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H1>father,<s%> Let it not <S%H2734>displease<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> that I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H6440>before<s%> you; for the <S%H1870>custom<s%> of <S%H802>women<s%> is on me. And he searched <S%H2664><s%>but <S%H4672>found<s%> not the <S%H8655>images.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H2734>wroth,<s%> and <S%H7378>strived<s%> with <S%H3837>Laban:<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is my <S%H6588>trespass?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is my <S%H2403>sin,<s%> that you have so <S%H1814>hotly<s%> <S%H1814>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me?

<S%H3588>Whereas<s%> you have <S%H4959>searched<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3627>stuff,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> have you <S%H4672>found<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H3627>stuff?<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> it <S%H3541>here<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> my <S%H251>brothers<s%> and your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> that they may <S%H3198>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> us <S%H8147>both.<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> have I been with you; your <S%H7353>ewes<s%> and your she <S%H5795>goats<s%> have not <S%H7921>cast<s%> their young, and the <S%H352>rams<s%> of your <S%H6629>flock<s%> have I not <S%H398>eaten.<s%>

That which was <S%H2966>torn<s%> of <S%H2966>beasts<s%> I <S%H935>brought<s%> not to you; I <S%H2398>bore<s%> the <S%H2398>loss<s%> of it; of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> did you <S%H1245>require<s%> it, whether <S%H1589>stolen<s%> by <S%H3117>day,<s%> or <S%H1589>stolen<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

Thus I was; in the <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H2721>drought<s%> <S%H398>consumed<s%> me, and the <S%H7140>frost<s%> by <S%H3915>night;<s%> and my <S%H8142>sleep<s%> <S%H5074>departed<s%> from my <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

<S%H2088>Thus<s%> have I been <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in your <S%H1004>house;<s%> I <S%H5647>served<s%> you <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for your <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for your <S%H6629>cattle:<s%> and you have <S%H2498>changed<s%> my <S%H4909>wages<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4489>times.<s%>

<S%H3884>Except<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> had <S%H1961>been<s%> with me, <S%H3588>surely<s%> you had <S%H7971>sent<s%> me away <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7387>empty.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and the <S%H3018>labor<s%> of my <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and <S%H3198>rebuked<s%> you last <S%H570>night.<s%>

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> These <S%H1323>daughters<s%> are my <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and these <S%H1121>children<s%> are my <S%H1121>children,<s%> and these <S%H6629>cattle<s%> are my <S%H6629>cattle,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H7200>see<s%> is mine: and <S%H4100>what<s%> can I <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H428>these<s%> my <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> to their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H3205>born?<s%>
<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H3212>come<s%> you, let us <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> I and you; and let it be for a <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H68>stone,<s%> and <S%H7311>set<s%> it up for a <S%H4676>pillar.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H3950>Gather<s%> <S%H68>stones;<s%> and they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H1530>heap:<s%> and they did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> on the <S%H1530>heap.<s%>
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H3026>Jegarsahadutha:<s%> but <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H1567>Galeed.<s%>

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H1530>heap<s%> is a <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you this <S%H3117>day.<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> was the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1567>Galeed;<s%>

And <S%H4709>Mizpah;<s%> for he <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6822>watch<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you, <S%H3588>when<s%> we are <S%H5641>absent<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> from <S%H7453>another.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> you shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> my <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> or <S%H518>if<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> other <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> my <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is with us; <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1530>heap,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> this <S%H4676>pillar,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H3384>cast<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you:

<S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H1530>heap<s%> be <S%H5707>witness,<s%> and this <S%H4676>pillar<s%> be <S%H5715>witness,<s%> that I will not <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1530>heap<s%> to you, and that you shall not <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1530>heap<s%> and <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4676>pillar<s%> to me, for <S%H7451>harm.<s%>

The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> us. And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> by the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> on the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread:<s%> and they did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H3885>tarried<s%> <S%H3885>all<s%> night in the <S%H2022>mount.<s%>

And <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> up, and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them: and <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H3212>departed,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H4725>place.<s%>
